author: newsr.in
title: Dropbox and Adobe team up to make ‘working with PDFs simple’ - newsR
text: Dropbox and Adobe announced a new partnership today that they say is just the first phase of “even deeper mobile integrations” expected to be rolled out in the coming months (iOS this year, Android in 2016). This first step will allow users to add their Dropbox account to Adobe Acrobat and Acrobat Reader desktop apps (PC […] »
